sentences.en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
sentences.cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

sentences.en: a four-year-old child
sentences.cn: 四岁的孩子

sentences.en: a three-year business plan
sentences.cn: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.en: After a year we will sympathetically consider an application for reinstatement.
sentences.cn: 一年后我们会对复职申请予以考虑和批准。

sentences.en: CBS's ratings again showed huge improvement over the previous year.
sentences.cn: 与前一年相比，哥伦比亚广播公司的收视率再次大幅提高。

sentences.en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentences.en: Fifteen-year-old Danny is on the run from a local authority home.
sentences.cn: 15岁的丹尼从地方当局的收容所逃跑了。

sentences.en: He fears inflation will ratchet up as the year ends.
sentences.cn: 他害怕通货膨胀会在年终更加严重。

sentences.en: He was jailed in February 1992 and could be released next year.
sentences.cn: 他于1992年2月入狱，可能明年获释。

sentences.en: he was murdered in the year of grace 1618.
sentences.cn: 他于1618年被谋杀。

sentences.en: He will actually be serving three concurrent five-year sentences.
sentences.cn: 实际上，他将服3个5年徒刑，合并执行。

sentences.en: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.cn: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.en: I only pull in 15,000 a year as a social worker.
sentences.cn: 作为一名社工，我每年仅挣15,000。

sentences.en: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.cn: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.en: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.cn: 约迪15岁。

sentences.en: Last year, economic growth tailed off to below four percent.
sentences.cn: 去年，经济增长率下降到4%以下。

sentences.en: Last year, he mailed the documents to French journalists.
sentences.cn: 他去年把这些文件寄给了法国记者。

sentences.en: She made a New Year's resolution to get fit.
sentences.cn: 她的新年决心是要保持身材健美。

sentences.en: The group had a net profit margin of 30% last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，这个集团的纯利润率为30%。

sentences.en: the sports personality of the year.
sentences.cn: 本年度最杰出的体育人物。

sentences.en: they rented the same bungalow year in, year out.
sentences.cn: 他们年年租用同一间平房。

sentences.en: They were knocking around together for about a year.
sentences.cn: 他们交往大概有一年了。

sentences.en: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.cn: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.en: Xandra is an athletic 36-year-old with a 21-year-old's body.
sentences.cn: 36岁的汉德拉身体健壮，有着21岁小伙子的体能。

phrases.tran_cn: 本年度最杰出的人（或事）
一年零一日的期限（某些法律规定的终止期限）

phrases.phrase: put years on (或 take years off) someone
phrases.tran_cn: 使某人感觉（或看起来）更老（或更年轻）

trans.tran_en: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time
a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time
